pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: The Negro in America: The Last Citizen
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Sound recordings of the series broadcast on WBAA, Purdue University. The interviews examine local and national social issues, including crime, religion, intimidation, protest, AfricanAmerican journalism and art, housing and the National Urban League.
